title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 852/92 of 3 April 1992 on the definitive application of the guarantee limitation arrangements for sheepmeat and goatmeat for the 1991 marketing year
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 852/92  of 3 April 1992  on the definitive application of the guarantee limitation arrangements for sheepmeat and goatmeat for the 1991 marketing year
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Pursuant to the second indent of Article 8 (2) of Regulation (EEC) No 3013/89, the provisional coefficient provided for in Regulation (EEC) No 3546/90 for the 1991 marketing year shall be corrected to read as follows:
- Great Britain: 5,9 %,
- rest of the Community: 7 %.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities. This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 3 April 1992. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 289, 7. 10. 1989, p. 1. (2) OJ No L 163, 26. 6. 1991, p. 41. (3) OJ No L 122, 12. 5. 1988, p. 69. (4) OJ No L 344, 8. 12. 1990, p. 23. (5) OJ No L 81, 27. 3. 1982, p. 35. (6) OJ No L 373, 31. 12. 1987, p. 1.
